New Records: Anthony Edwards became only the second player after Stephen Curry to make 50 threes in the first nine games of the season.
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored 37 points, including nine three-pointers, leading the Minnesota Timberwolves to a 127-102 victory over the Portland Trail Blazers.
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards expressed surprise at the defensive strategy of the Portland Trail Blazers, which allowed him to take numerous three-point shots.
Edwards emphasized his commitment to continue shooting if defenders keep going under screens.
